DE

Surprise!

1995 • 6 minutes • Germany

Synopsis

A man gathers together an arsenal of lethal weapons around his lover’s bed. It looks as if he wants to kill her, while she is fast asleep!

Details

Director
Veit Helmer
Cast
  • Max Tidof
  • Yutah Lorenz
Crew
Director
Veit Helmer
Cinematography
Stefan von Borbély
Music
Niki Reiser
Technical
35 mm, hand coloured, no dialogue
Awards
  • 32 awards
  • Audience award, Cannes 1995
  • German Film Award in silver
